subject: Self Care
title: Willpower Is a Limited Resource
description: A quick, practical guide to Willpower Is a Limited Resource.

hook.text: By 8 PM you eat the cake you resisted all day. Willpower ran out. It was never going to last forever.

buildup.text: Roy Baumeister's research showed willpower depletes like a battery with each decision you make.

discovery.text: Decision fatigue explains why people make worse choices at the end of the day. The tank is simply empty.

twist.text: Habits bypass willpower entirely. Automatic actions don't require decisions. They just happen.

climax.text: Design your environment and routines so the right choice is automatic. Stop relying on running willpower.

punchline.text: Don't rely on willpower. Build systems instead.

quiz.question: Why does willpower fail at the end of the day?
options: Decision fatigue depletes willpower like a battery
Willpower only works in the morning
